text: Tunç Başaran (October 1, 1938 – December 18, 2019) was a Turkish screenwriter, movie director, movie producer and actor. He was born in Istanbul. In 1964 he directed his first feature Survival. By 1962, he had directed about 40 movies. He directed Ayşecik ve Sihirli Cüceler Rüyalar Ülkesinde, Don't Let Them Shoot the Kite and Piano Piano Kid. Başaran died on December 18, 2019 in Istanbul of soft-tissue sarcoma at the age of 81. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from soft-tissue sarcoma Category:Turkish movie directors Category:Turkish screenwriters Category:Turkish movie producers Category:Actors from Istanbul
title: Tunç Başaran
